title: Jan.Troell.1968.Ole.dole.doff.(Who.saw.him.die)
description:
Disillusioned with the work, the teacher Martensson tries desperately to maintain control over their class messy. The school system does not help and some parents are involved in the upbringing of children, requiring him to comply with the rules of the institution. With courage, he tries to overcome the gap between generations, while loving and hating his job and students. Though often in favor of the students, their position of authority the power to take unpleasant decisions.
